sqlMap.insert:
select SEQ_BASIC_INFO.NEXTVAL as value from dual
insert into RL_JOB_INFO (JOB_INFO_ID, BORROWER_SERVICE_APP_ID, WORKUNIT_ADDRESS, WORKUNIT_TELEPHONE, ENTER_TIME, DEPARTMENT, POST, COMPANY, YEARS, CONTANT_PERSON, CONTAN_TELEPHONE,INCOME,SEQ) values (#jobInfoId:DECIMAL#, #borrowerServiceAppId:DECIMAL#, #workunitAddress:VARCHAR#, #workunitTelephone:VARCHAR#, #enterTime:TIMESTAMP#, #department:VARCHAR#, #post:VARCHAR#, #company:VARCHAR#, #years:DECIMAL#, #contantPerson:VARCHAR#, #contanTelephone:VARCHAR#,#income:DOUBLE#,#seq#)
sqlMap.update: update RL_JOB_INFO set WORKUNIT_ADDRESS = #workunitAddress:VARCHAR#, WORKUNIT_TELEPHONE = #workunitTelephone:VARCHAR#, ENTER_TIME = #enterTime:TIMESTAMP#, DEPARTMENT = #department:VARCHAR#, POST = #post:VARCHAR#, COMPANY = #company:OTHER#, YEARS = #years:DECIMAL#, CONTANT_PERSON = #contantPerson:VARCHAR#, CONTAN_TELEPHONE = #contanTelephone:VARCHAR#, INCOME = #income:DOUBLE# where JOB_INFO_ID = #jobInfoId:DECIMAL#

update RL_JOB_INFO set WORKUNIT_ADDRESS = #workunitAddress:VARCHAR#, POST = #post:VARCHAR#, COMPANY = #company:OTHER#, YEARS = #years:DECIMAL#, CONTANT_PERSON = #contantPerson:VARCHAR#, CONTAN_TELEPHONE = #contanTelephone:VARCHAR#, INCOME = #income:DOUBLE# where JOB_INFO_ID = #jobInfoId:DECIMAL#

update RL_JOB_INFO
WORKUNIT_ADDRESS = #workunitAddress:VARCHAR#
WORKUNIT_TELEPHONE = #workunitTelephone:VARCHAR#
ENTER_TIME = #enterTime:TIMESTAMP#
DEPARTMENT = #department:VARCHAR#
POST = #post:VARCHAR#
COMPANY = #company:OTHER#
YEARS = #years:DECIMAL#
CONTANT_PERSON = #contantPerson:VARCHAR#
CONTAN_TELEPHONE = #contanTelephone:VARCHAR#
INCOME = #income:DOUBLE#
where JOB_INFO_ID = #jobInfoId:DECIMAL#

update RL_JOB_INFO
WORKUNIT_ADDRESS = #workunitAddress:VARCHAR#
WORKUNIT_TELEPHONE = #workunitTelephone:VARCHAR#
ENTER_TIME = #enterTime:TIMESTAMP#
DEPARTMENT = #department:VARCHAR#
POST = #post:VARCHAR#
COMPANY = #company:OTHER#
YEARS = #years:DECIMAL#
CONTANT_PERSON = #contantPerson:VARCHAR#
CONTAN_TELEPHONE = #contanTelephone:VARCHAR#
where BORROWER_SERVICE_APP_ID = #borrowerServiceAppId:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.select: select * from RL_JOB_INFO where BORROWER_SERVICE_APP_ID=#borrowerServiceAppId# order by seq
